class.comment: Represents a Minecraft Difficulty. Difficulties are used to indicate how hard the game is to play.

enumerations.name: PEACEFUL
enumerations.comment: Peaceful difficulty. No hostile mobs spawn and the player's hunger is disabled.

enumerations.name: EASY
enumerations.comment: Easy difficulty. Hostile mobs spawn but do not deal as much damage as they would on other difficulties.

enumerations.name: NORMAL
enumerations.comment: Normal difficulty. Hostile mobs spawn and deal normal amounts of damage.

enumerations.name: HARD
enumerations.comment: Hard difficulty. Hostile mobs spawn and deal more damage than they would on other difficulties.

BY_ID.comment: A function that returns a difficulty based on its numerical id.

id.comment: The numerical id of this difficulty.

key.comment: The human-readable key used to identify this difficulty.

getId.comment: Returns the numerical id of this difficulty.

getDisplayName.comment: Returns the display name of this difficulty as a Translatable Component.

getInfo.comment: Returns the info of this difficulty as a Translatable Component.

params.name: id
params.comment: The numerical id of the difficulty to return.

byId.comment: Returns a difficulty based on its numerical id.
